default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Good to see you're well, Chief. Is bumping into you here a matter of destiny, coincidence... or a manipulated incident?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: How do you want me to repay you for helping me like this?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The bell tolls, playing the rites of the people, praising the voices of humanity... The so-called "sacred sign" has always existed between you and me.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: So this is the craftsmanship of the great DisCity?

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: In my hometown, casually touching other people's heads could lead to... Nevermind, it's better if you don't know.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Just at the right time.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Thanks~

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: It seems that I, a mere scholar, can't stand up against the heavenly calamity anyways...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: The smoke has risen. Now, play your heart out.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Is this written in my fate... huh, how I hate it...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Gods can't help you with your workload or relieve your stress, but maybe I can. Why don't you give it a try by asking nicely?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Some people long for those bizarre and magical stories, and some fear those miracles beyond human power... So, which one are you, Chief?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: A good fragrance, a collection of thoughts, a heart that seeks the truth—that's all a mythologist needs.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: If there really are gods and ghosts in the world, why hasn't anyone ever answer those pious wishes? But if they never existed... then where do people's prayers go...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Did you see it? The sun rises and sets... the ordinary daily life that is yearned for by some is right here...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I've told you so many legends now, it's only fair that I also hear some from you. But I don't like to share. I want stories you've never told anyone before, some secrets only known to the heavens, earth, you, and me.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: You've given me truth, trust, strength, and a place to belong. I've really taken advantage of you. From now on, let me take my time to pay you back.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Got some good news, Chief. Want to hear it? I drew a fortune for you. You'll meet a very kind benefactor today... What are you looking for? Isn't it obvious that I'm right in front of you?

default.title: Idle
default.text: Did you know, the Sun Crow can actually swim... Shh! This is a highly confidential heavenly secret. Don't let anyone hear it.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Stop messing around... My incense burner might just come alive and swallow you whole!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Such a bustling and glamorous foreign land. Aren't you afraid I might be tempted away by this dazzling world?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I'm back empty handed... Just kidding, here you go~

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Legend has it that if you bow three times and kowtow nine times towards the direction of the sunset, a wish can be granted... Oh, you didn't fall for it?

lunaria_enigma.title: Level Up
lunaria_enigma.text: Westward, the tides rise; amidst their ebb and flow, the Moon shines.

lunaria_enigma.title: Pat Head
lunaria_enigma.text: Is this a new form of mortal ritual? Hm, the gestures of courtesy matter not. As long as you're a sincere petitioner, I shall grant you lunar grace.

lunaria_enigma.title: Obtain Attire
lunaria_enigma.text: To have braved the Tidal Illusion and found your way to me... Traveler, you share a rare bond with the Moon. Remain here, bathe in its silver light, and become my herald.

lunaria_enigma.title: Greeting
lunaria_enigma.text: When the Moon is full, families reunite. Each time I witness their joy, I long to descend to the mortal world and share their bliss.

lunaria_enigma.title: Ordinary Contact 1
lunaria_enigma.text: You seem quite taken by the splash on my gown... Hm, ordinary waters cannot touch the form of a goddess, but this pond has felt my grace. It offered its devotion willingly, and thus becoming part of my power.

lunaria_enigma.title: Ordinary Contact 2
lunaria_enigma.text: They praise that long may the sun shine, claiming the Moon merely mirrors the light. But I say, without the Moon, how could there be a morrow, if a good day does not end with moonlit sorrow?

lunaria_enigma.title: Ordinary Contact 3
lunaria_enigma.text: The full moon pierces the night; the tide burning in your veins echoes with mine. Come, gaze upon the waters—do you not see yourself in a new light?

lunaria_enigma.title: Ordinary Contact 4
lunaria_enigma.text: Some tales say an old couple found me inside a bamboo stalk; others claim I coveted the immortal elixir to ascend to Heaven... Hm, amusing stories, indeed. Attend me, my herald—how would you spin a story of my origin?

lunaria_enigma.title: Idle
lunaria_enigma.text: The Moon may be veiled by clouds, but never for long. It shall always cut through the mist and once again shed light upon the world.

lunaria_enigma.title: Special Attention
lunaria_enigma.text: The Moon has delivered your wish. The goddess shall grant her grace to her most devoted heralds. Step aboard this boat, and heed the words I bestow upon you.
